name: Advantage
description: If you have Advantage on a D20 Test, roll two d20s, and use the higher roll. A roll can't be affected by more than one Advantage, and Advantage and Disadvantage on the same roll cancel each other. See also chapter 1 ("D20 Tests").

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/rules-glossary/13-Rules Glossary - Player's Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
